mapper.update:
update drug_member
men_name = #{menName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update drug_member set men_name = #{menName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_pwd = #{memPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_phone = #{memPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_address = #{memAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_pictrue = #{memPictrue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where men_id = #{menId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
